hymn.title: Outreach of the glorious gospel
hymn.category: Preaching of the Gospel—By the Flow of Life

layout.singingstanza: Out -- reach of the glo -- rious gos -- pel Is the flow of life with -- in; It is by our tes -- ti -- mo -- ny That lost sin -- ners we may win. Grant us, Lord, the liv -- ing out -- flow, May Thy life through us be seen; Through us as Thy liv -- ing ves -- sels Quick -- en peo -- ple from with -- in.

lyrics.stanza: Outreach of the glorious gospel Is the flow of life within; It is by our testimony That lost sinners we may win.
Grant us, Lord, the living outflow, May Thy life through us be seen; Through us as Thy living vessels Quicken people from within.
It is by the life convincing That the people may believe; It is by the life imparting That the souls may life receive.
Always in the Lord abiding, As the branches fruit to bear; By the inner life out-flowing Christ with others we may share.
May our living be the preaching, Making Christ to others known; Not the word of doctrine-preaching, But the seed of life be sown.
